H0.text: Anosmia is the lack of which of the senses in humans. Taste

H1.text: Anosmia is the lack of which of the senses in humans. Hearing

H2.text: Anosmia is the lack of which of the senses in humans. Touch

H3.text: Anosmia is the lack of which of the senses in humans. Smell

A4.text: Anosmia, also known as smell blindness, is the lack of ability to detect one or more smells.

A5.text: Anosmia is the inability to smell.
